content: **drops gloves with flap in merino extra fine ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-012 **size** s/m - l/xl **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 150 g for both sizes color no 04m medium gray drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 - or size needed to get 22 sts x 30 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops double pointed needles size 3 mm / us 2or3 for rib drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c for buttonhole loops drops burned wooden buttons no 513 2 pcs
